document.full_text: reclusive north korea is preparing for a third generation of kim family rule, with the young and inexperienced kim jong-un poised to take over from his father to run the autocratic state born out of the cold war.
document.title: n.korea's first son makes leap by visiting china
lines_and_colors: reclusive north korea is preparing for a third generation of kim family rule, with the young and inexperienced kim jong-un poised to take over from his father to run the autocratic state born out of the cold war.
